CONFIGURATIONS/add-members-configuration.description: This refers to the properties of the CometChatAddMembers component that are available for customisation via the parent component when the component exists in a deep nested hierarchy.

CONFIGURATIONS/reaction-info-configurati.description: You can modify the Reaction Info component's properties using the ReactionInfoConfiguration object. To use a configuration, you simply need to pass it to respective parameter.

DATA MODEL/actionitem.title: ActionItem
DATA MODEL/actionitem.description: CometChatActionItem is a pre-defined structure for creating action that can be used to perform an action such as a button click or navigating a link.

DATA MODEL/actionsicon.title: ActionsIcon
DATA MODEL/actionsicon.description: CometChatActionsIcon is a pre-defined structure for creating actions that the user can perform on a message with an icon representation.

DATA MODEL/actionsview.title: ActionsView
DATA MODEL/actionsview.description: CometChatActionsView is a pre-defined structure for creating actions that the user can perform on a message with a customised UI view representation.

DATA MODEL/detailsoption.title: DetailsOption
DATA MODEL/detailsoption.description: CometChatDetailsOption is a pre-defined structure for creating option within a DetailsTemplate in the CometChatDetails component.

DATA MODEL/detailstemplate.title: DetailsTemplate
DATA MODEL/detailstemplate.description: CometChatDetailsTemplate is a pre-defined structure for creating a template data for the CometChatDetails component.

DATA MODEL/messagecomposeraction.title: MessageComposerAction
DATA MODEL/messagecomposeraction.description: CometChatMessageComposerAction is a pre-defined structure for creating an attachment option in the CometChatMessageComposer component that the user can perform in addition to composing a message.

DATA MODEL/messagetemplate.title: MessageTemplate
DATA MODEL/messagetemplate.description: CometChatMessageTemplate is a pre-defined structure for creating message views that can be used as a starting point or blueprint for creating message views, often known as message bubbles. These views appear in the message list view and render the messages of that particular chat or conversation. It allows developers to define standard message viewing formats that can be reused or customised for different use cases, or even add new ones for their own purposes.

DATA MODEL/option.title: Option
DATA MODEL/option.description: CometChatOption is a pre-defined structure for creating an option that can be used to perform an action message such as edit, delete etc.

DATA MODEL/tabitem.title: TabItem
DATA MODEL/tabitem.description: CometChatTabItem is a pre-defined structure for creating a tab item that can be part of tabbed interface.

DATA MODEL/uikitsettings.title: UIKitSettings
DATA MODEL/uikitsettings.description: UIKitSettings is pre-defined structure containing credentials required to initialise CometChat SDK.

ENUMS/auxiliarybuttonalignment.title: AuxiliaryButtonAlignment
ENUMS/auxiliarybuttonalignment.description: AuxiliaryButtonAlignment describes the positioning of auxiliary buttons in CometChatMessageComposer component.

ENUMS/datepatterns.title: DatePatterns
ENUMS/datepatterns.description: DatePatterns describes a specific format or arrangement used to represent dates in a human-readable form.

ENUMS/documenticonalignment.title: DocumentIconAlignment
ENUMS/documenticonalignment.description: DocumentIconAlignment describes the positioning of icon within the CometChatDocumentBubble component.

ENUMS/httpsrequestmethods.title: HTTPSRequestMethods
ENUMS/httpsrequestmethods.description: HTTPSRequestMethods lists the HTTP methods for API requests.

ENUMS/iconbuttonalignment.title: IconButtonAlignment
ENUMS/iconbuttonalignment.description: IconButtonAlignment describes the positioning of icon within the CometChatIconButton component.

ENUMS/labelalignment.title: LabelAlignment
ENUMS/labelalignment.description: LabelAlignment is used to align the label for web elements.

ENUMS/messagebubblealignment.title: MessageBubbleAlignment
ENUMS/messagebubblealignment.description: MessageBubbleAlignment describes the positioning of the message bubble.

ENUMS/messagelistalignment.title: MessageListAlignment
ENUMS/messagelistalignment.description: MessageListAlignment describes the positioning or arrangement of message bubbles in the component

ENUMS/receipts.title: Receipts
ENUMS/receipts.description: Receipts describes the different states of sent messages.

ENUMS/selectionmode.title: SelectionMode
ENUMS/selectionmode.description: MessageListAlignment describes the positioning or arrangement of message bubbles in the component

ENUMS/tabalignment.title: TabAlignment
ENUMS/tabalignment.description: TabAlignment describes alignment or positioning of tabs in a tabbed interface

ENUMS/tabsvisibility.title: TabsVisibility
ENUMS/tabsvisibility.description: TabsVisibility describes distinct state of tabs in order to change their visibility

ENUMS/timestampalignment.title: TimestampAlignment
ENUMS/timestampalignment.description: TimestampAlignment described the positioning or arrangement of timestamp for each message bubble in the component

EVENTS/calls-events.title: Calls Events
EVENTS/calls-events.description: CometChatCallEvents emits events when the logged-in user executes some action on a call object.

EVENTS/conversations-events.title: Conversations Events
EVENTS/conversations-events.description: CometChatConversationEvents emits events when the logged-in user executes some action on a conversation object.

EVENTS/groups-events.title: Groups Events
EVENTS/groups-events.description: CometChatGroupEvents emits events when the logged-in user executes some action on a group object.

EVENTS/messages-events.title: Messages Events
EVENTS/messages-events.description: CometChatMessageEvents emits events when the logged-in user executes some action on a message object.

EVENTS/ui-events.title: UI Events
EVENTS/ui-events.description: UI events, refer to actions or interactions performed by a user within the CometChat's UI Kit. These events are triggered when a user interacts with various UI elements, such as buttons, menus, checkboxes, input fields, or any other interactive components.

EVENTS/users-events.title: Users Events
EVENTS/users-events.description: CometChatUserEvents emits events when the logged-in user executes some action on an user object.

INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/action-entity.title: Action Entity
INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/action-entity.description: Base class for defining the type of actions that can be performed on BaseInteractiveElement

INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/button-element.title: Button Element
INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/button-element.description: The ButtonElement class, inherited from the BaseInteractiveElement class, represents an interactive button element that can be added to a chat interface. It comprises of properties like button text and a flag indicating whether the button should be disabled after interaction.

INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/card-bubble.title: Card Bubble
INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/card-bubble.description: The CometChatCardBubble component is used to display a card within a chat bubble. The card includes an image, text, and action buttons. It helps to offer action-oriented chat experiences, like booking a flight, ordering food, scheduling a meeting, etc., directly in the chat.

INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/card-message.title: Card Message
INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/card-message.description: The CardMessage class is used to create a card message for CometChat. It extends the InteractiveMessage class from CometChat.

INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/checkbox-element.title: Checkbox Element
INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/checkbox-element.description: The CheckboxElement class aids in creating checkbox input elements in a user interface.

INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/cometchatschedulerb.title: SchedulerBubble
INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/cometchatschedulerb.description: SchedulerBubble is a versatile type of component designed to facilitate easy and efficient event scheduling. It offers the following key features:

INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/custom-interactive-.title: Custom Interactive Message
INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/custom-interactive-.description: The CustomInteractiveMessage class extends CometChat's InteractiveMessage class and represents a custom interactive message that can be sent via CometChat.

INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/Date-time-picker-el.title: DateTimePickerElement
INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/Date-time-picker-el.description: The DateTimePickerElement class is used to create a Date Picker element in a user interface.

INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/dropdown-element.title: DropdownElement
INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/dropdown-element.description: The DropdownElement class is used to create a dropdown selection element in a user interface.

INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/element-type.title: Element Type
INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/element-type.description: This is the base class for every element possible in the Interactive message component, defined by CometChat

INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/form-bubble.title: Form Bubble
INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/form-bubble.description: The CometChatFormBubble component is used to render a form within a chat bubble. The form fields are dynamically built based on the data passed in the message prop. The form fields can include text inputs, checkboxes, radio buttons, dropdown, labels, single selects, buttons. Once the form is filled out and submitted, the data will be sent to the provided URL or handled by a custom function.

INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/form-message.title: Form Message
INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/form-message.description: The FormMessage class is used to create an interactive form message that can be sent via CometChat. It extends the InteractiveMessage class from CometChat.

INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/label-element.title: Label Element
INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/label-element.description: The LabelElement class enables the creation of a label element in a user interface.

INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/radio-button-elemen.title: Radio Button Element
INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/radio-button-elemen.description: The RadioButtonElement class is designed to create a radio button input element in a user interface.

INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/scheduler-message.title: Scheduler Message
INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/scheduler-message.description: The SchedulerMessage class is used to create an interactive scheduler message that can be sent via CometChat. It extends the Interactive Messages class from CometChat.

INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/single-select-eleme.title: Single Select Element
INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/single-select-eleme.description: The SingleSelectElement  class is utilised to create a single selection input element in a user interface.

INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/text-input-element.title: Text Input Element
INTERACTIVE MESSAGES/text-input-element.description: The TextInputElement class is used to create a text input element in a user interface.

overview/index.title: Overview
overview/index.description: This is a collection of utility functions and constants for building chat UI components with CometChat's web UIKits. This is created and published as a dependency of all our web UIKits.

RESOURCES/localize.title: Localize
RESOURCES/localize.description: With language localization, CometChat UI Kit adapts to the language of a specific country or region. CometChatLocalize allows you to detect the language of your users based on their browser settings and set the language accordingly.

RESOURCES/sound-manager.title: Sound Manager
RESOURCES/sound-manager.description: CometChatSoundManager provides functionalities for managing audio playback for incoming / outgoing messages in 1:1 or group chat.

RESOURCES/theme.title: Theme
RESOURCES/theme.description: CometChatTheme class is made up of two primary components such as:

SHARED-COMPONENTS/reaction-info.title: ReactionInfo
SHARED-COMPONENTS/reaction-info.description: The CometChatReactionInfo component is used to display the count and users of a specific reaction to a message.

SHARED-COMPONENTS/reaction-list.title: ReactionList
SHARED-COMPONENTS/reaction-list.description: The CometChatReactionList component is used to manage and display reactions in messages. It provides functionalities like fetching reactions when a message is updated, updating the reactions, and observing when the user has scrolled to the end of the reaction list.

SHARED-COMPONENTS/reactions.title: Reactions
SHARED-COMPONENTS/reactions.description: The CometChatReactions component is used to display a list of reactions to a specific message. Users can see who has reacted to the message and with what emoji.

STYLES/withmessagesstyle.description: Styling properties of all the CometChatConversationsWithMessages, CometChatUsersWithMessages, CometChatGroupsWithMessages component.
